name: Inner Growth
description:
You can play it in the browser, but the downloaded version is much smoother 😉

This game was made for the "STOP WAITING FOR GODOT" jam.
The theme "keep it simple" motivated me to join with something that isn't big, full of complicated gameplay to learn.

LEFT MOUSE - Grow
RIGHT MOUSE - Shrink
F11 - Toggle Fullscreen (Desktop)

Music: "Jason Shaw - Acoustic Meditation"
